title: How is Riot grading us
body: So the last few games i played, i played graves and had 21/0/5 and i got an A and the top laner with 11/7/8 got S. at that point i thought Riot was just screwing with me and this happened to me a good couple of times.

replies.body:
It isn't a set score you need to achieve, it's all relative to how everyone else on the server is doing with the same champ in the same role.

From Riot:

> It’s based on the champion and role that you just played in a game. So, for example, we look at Annie mid differently to Annie support. We take a series of performance metrics and compare how you do to all other players in your region in your champion / position combination. It is percentile driven - so earning a high score means** you performed in the top x% of players** on that champ in that position. The grade itself governs the point gains.

[(Source)](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery)

[Basically grades similarly to a bell curve](http://study.com/academy/lesson/bell-curve-definition-impact-on-grades.html), meaning we have a server full of really good players. 

**Riot hasn't released a list of the factors that contribute to a high grade,** but I would suggest working on CS, objective assists, and possibly warding to bump up your grade that extra notch ♥
so it is your in-game activity that determines your grade ?

Yep. A variety of statistics (which can all be viewed in detail in the post-game lobby of a match) contribute to a good grade, it's about more than just your K/D/A. As Yaia suggested, working on CS, objectives and warding *should* allow you to improve the grades you get significantly.

Here is a link to one of my games as Alistar Support - That I got an S or S+

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/127209487/200146072?tab=stats

As you well know, Support's do not get much CS at all - so the role is determined by Assists, Ward placement, and Not dying too much.

In the case of other roles, main factors include - CS Score, Kills, Assists, Low deaths, and the performance overall is reconciled with other players in the region playing the same champion/role and how they went.
